name: Future Soccer
description:
Future Soccer is a fast-paced sports game based on the classic game of Soccer, but with a futuristic twist! Set in a distant future with incredible technological advancements, Future Soccer pits you against skilled opponents in a wide variety of arenas.

Players are equipped with a powerful close-range "Volley Gun" that can launch the ball (and their opponent) with great velocity. Beware, holding the ball leaves a player extremely vulnerable to their opponent's volley gun! Anyone who falls in battle is instantly rematerialized at their side of the field, though ball possession is lost. The team with more goals at the end of the game is victorious!

FAST-PACED 2v2 GAMEPLAY
Constant end-to-end action ensures that there's never a dull moment! Perform advanced moves to outsmart and outplay your opponents. Mastering the use of shots, volleys, and tackles will give you the edge in battle!

8 UNIQUE ARENAS TO PLAY ON
Battle on a wide variety of soccer stadiums... anything from standard soccer fields to bizarre spike-walled chambers! For a twist, some arenas feature boost-pads that launch the ball in unexpected ways!

UPGRADES AND CUSTOMIZATION
All of your progress and statistics are recorded in your personal player profile. Battle-hardened players can earn talent points to spend on various upgrades that allow you to customize your character. Experiment with different upgrade setups until you find the perfect fit for your play-style!
